entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as the one who closed the door and swept round her desk to face Harry, Ron, Hermione and Leanne. She is described as speaking sharply.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present in the room with Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present in the room with Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being present in the room with Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: leanne
entities.description: Leanne is introduced as the one who was still sobbing and telling Professor McGonagall what happened.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as having gone to the bathroom in the Three Broomsticks and returned holding an unmarked package.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall questioned Leanne about what happened.
Leanne was involved with Katie in the incident where Katie returned holding an unmarked package.
